name: Apple
description: Crisp and juicy red apple, perfect for snacking or baking.

name: Banana
description: Sweet and creamy banana, great for smoothies or as a quick energy boost.

name: Orange
description: Tangy and refreshing orange, rich in vitamin C.

name: Strawberry
description: Sweet and succulent strawberry, ideal for desserts or fresh eating.

name: Grape
description: Juicy green grapes, perfect for snacking or making wine.

name: Pineapple
description: Tropical pineapple with a sweet and tangy flavor, great for grilling or salads.

name: Mango
description: Sweet and juicy mango, known as the king of fruits.

name: Kiwi
description: Tart and refreshing kiwi, packed with vitamins.

name: Watermelon
description: Large and juicy watermelon, perfect for summer picnics.

name: Peach
description: Soft and sweet peach, delicious when ripe.

name: Lemon
description: Sour and tangy lemon, perfect for cooking and drinks.

name: Lime
description: Zesty lime, great for cocktails and Asian cuisine.

name: Cherry
description: Sweet and tart cherry, ideal for pies and fresh eating.

name: Blueberry
description: Small and sweet blueberries, packed with antioxidants.

name: Raspberry
description: Delicate and tangy raspberry, perfect for jams and desserts.

name: Blackberry
description: Juicy blackberry with a unique flavor, great for smoothies.

name: Pear
description: Sweet and juicy pear, excellent for poaching or eating fresh.

name: Plum
description: Sweet and tart plum, perfect for jams or fresh consumption.

name: Apricot
description: Velvety apricot with a sweet flavor, great for drying.

name: Fig
description: Sweet and chewy fig, often used in Mediterranean cuisine.
